name: Malloween
description:
You must roast mallows to end the nightmare, escape from roaring monsters and stumble through bramble being chased.

(Make sure to light a marshmallow so you can use it as a torch ingame!!)

Controls:

WASD/Left Stick to move

Shift/R1/Right Bumper to sprint

E/xbox A to interact

F/xbox B to light unlit fires

========================================== 

Should be about 10-20 minutes worth of game cx

Made for the Weekly Game Jam 262.
